rooms.description: A welcoming entrance area positioned to receive positive energy as per Vastu principles. Adjacent to the central courtyard.
Open plan living space merging Mediterranean style with vibrant color palettes and natural light from large windows facing the central courtyard. Adheres to local norms.
Functional kitchen area designed with modern amenities and storage solutions; placed near the living room for efficient circulation. Vastu compliant placement ensuring east or north orientation.
Spacious master bedroom with built-in wardrobes and Mediterranean decor. Positioned away from the entrance for privacy and adheres to Vastu by having a north-east orientation.

openings.description: Main entrance door facing the courtyard to harness positive energy.
Large windows oriented towards the central courtyard ensuring ample natural light and ventilation.
Windows designed to facilitate cross-ventilation in compliance with local building norms.

additional_features.description: A central open space providing natural light and ventilation throughout the apartment. The courtyard is landscaped with local flora and features seating areas for relaxation.

vastu_considerations.orientation: The entrance and main living spaces face east or north to ensure positive energy flow.
vastu_considerations.description: Floor plan is designed in accordance with Vastu principles, ensuring proper alignment and harmony between spaces.
